content.en: Ship design optimization: Researchers are exploring how algorithms can optimize ship design and performance. They are using computer-aided design, computational fluid dynamics (CFD), and optimization modules to develop methods for ship design. By integrating numerical and experimental results, simulation-based design frameworks, and global optimization algorithms, they aim to optimize the design of fast multihull ships. These algorithms can improve the hydrodynamics performance of fishing ships, optimize ship dimensions for operational efficiency in waves, and enhance the resistance reduction and propeller intake flow of trimaran hulls.
content.da: Skibsdesignoptimering: Forskere undersøger, hvordan algoritmer kan optimere skibsdesign og ydeevne. De benytter computerbaseret design, beregningsbaseret fluiddynamik (CFD) og optimeringsmoduler til at udvikle metoder for skibsdesign. Ved at integrere numeriske og eksperimentelle resultater, simulationsbaserede designrammer og globale optimeringsalgoritmer, sigter de mod at optimere designet af hurtige fler-skrogsskibe. Disse algoritmer kan forbedre hydrodynamisk ydeevne af fiskeskibe, optimere skibsdimensioner for operationel effektivitet i bølger og forbedre modstandsreduktion og propellerindtag af trimaranskrog.
